definition: extragalactic star system/galaxy (not including our Galaxy)

sentences.english: Killing an alien gives you some points.
sentences.chinese: 杀死一个外星人会给您加分。

sentences.english: Fair-skinned Marcia Cross may just be an alien.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤白皙的马西娅可能是外星人。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, extraterrestrials have landed.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，外星人登陆过地球。

sentences.english: I like aliens because I think they are smart and special.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢外星人，以为我觉得他们很聪明很特别。

sentences.english: His quirky study uses a famous maths formula called The Drake Equation, which was first used to estimate the existence of extra-terrestrial life。
sentences.chinese: 这一公式最初被用于估算外星生命存在的几率。

sentences.english: Fear and greed expose the spaceship crew to an alien  parasite.
sentences.chinese: 恐惧和贪婪使太空船成员受到外星寄生虫的威胁。

sentences.english: I saw a UFO. 2. We were visited by aliens.
Peope have shown great interest in his disappearance due to alien visits.
sentences.chinese: 由于外星人来访人们对他的失踪表现出极大的兴趣。

sentences.english: If aliens landed here right now, what would you do?
sentences.chinese: 如果此刻有外星人在此登陆，你会怎么做？

sentences.english: My classmate was abducted by aliens.
sentences.chinese: 我的同学被外星人拐跑了。

sentences.english: Superchiral light could even aid the search for extraterrestrial life.
sentences.chinese: 超手性光束还可能有助于寻找外星生命。

sentences.english: On the question of 'external guidance', he does not rule out extraterrestrial help.
sentences.chinese: 至于“遥控指导”的问题，他没有排除外星人的帮助。

sentences.english: How long could it be until one of those hungry alien races come knocking on our door?
sentences.chinese: 离那些穷凶极恶的外星种族到来还有多久？

sentences.english: The extraterrestrials may be too different from us to communicate with usefully.
sentences.chinese: 也许是外星人与我们太不一样了而不能较好的沟通。

sentences.english: Mitchell's belief in the existence of aliens is well documented.
sentences.chinese: 米切尔确信外星人存在的观点，之前也是有案可查的。

sentences.english: The alien itself was pale in color, I could even say white.
sentences.chinese: 外星人的面色很差，甚至可以说是苍白。

definition: celestial body (e.g. planet, satellite etc)/heavenly body
Star Trek (US TV and film series)
